block.goml.lake_spirit_grace.description: Grants all players within a claim
block.goml.angelic_aura.description.1: Grants all players within a claim
block.goml.heaven_wings.description.1: Grants all players within a claim
block.goml.village_core.description.1: Protects all villagers within a claim
block.goml.village_core.description.2: from damage caused by hostile mobs.
text.goml.gui.input_greeting.title: Change greeting text
text.goml.gui.player_list.title: Trusted players
text.goml.gui.click_to_remove: Click to remove player from claim
text.goml.gui.player_add_gui.title: Add player to claim
text.goml.gui.claim.title: Claim
text.goml.gui.augment_list.title: Anchor Augments
text.goml.gui.admin_settings.title: Modify Admin Claim
text.goml.command.no_claims: You aren't standing in any claim!
text.goml.command.already_added: Player %s is already added to the claim!
text.goml.command.number_all: Number of claims across all worlds: %s
text.goml.command.owner_added: %s has been added as an owner to this claim.
text.goml.command.owner_removed: %s has been removed as an owner to this claim.
text.goml.command.trusted: %s has been added as a trusted member to this claim.
text.goml.command.untrusted: %s has been removed as a trusted member from this claim.
text.goml.command.add_self: You are already allowed in this claim!
text.goml.command.remove_self: You can't remove yourself from this claim!
text.goml.command.removed_claim: Removed claim in %s with origin of %s.
text.goml.command.cant_escape: You can't escape from here, because this area isn't protected agains you!
text.goml.block_protected: This block is protected by a claim!
text.goml.entity_protected: This entity is protected by a claim!
text.goml.area_protected: This area is protected by a claim!
text.goml.cant_place_claim.max_count_rea: You can't place any more claims! You have %s claims already!
text.goml.cant_place_claim.blacklisted_a: You can't place this claim in %s at %s! This area is blacklisted!
text.goml.cant_place_claim.collides_with: You can't place this claim, because it would collide with others! Colliding claims: %s
text.goml.cant_place_claim.admin_only: You can't place this claim, because it requires enabled Admin Mode!
text.goml.cant_upgrade_claim.collides_wi: You can't upgrade this claim, because it would collide with others! Colliding claims: %s
text.goml.command.help.info: prints information about any claims at the user's position.
text.goml.command.help.addowner: adds an owner to the current claim.
text.goml.command.help.trust: adds a trusted member to the current claim.
text.goml.command.help.untrust: removes a trusted member from the current claim.
text.goml.command.help.list: displays all claims you have access to.
text.goml.command.help.gui: displays gui of claim you stand on.
text.goml.admin_mode.enabled: Enabled Admin Mode! You can now modify claims of other players!
text.goml.admin_mode.disabled: Disabled Admin Mode! You can no longer modify claims of other players!
text.goml.changed_greeting: Your claim's greeting has been changed to: %s
